results.title: Sympathovagal balance analysis in idiopathic postural orthostatic tachycardia syndrome.
results.text_hl: The increase in LF/HF power ratio may represent sympathetic beta-receptors hyperactivity. @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ alleviated his clinical symptoms.
